alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 9:38AM EST until January 31 at 4:36PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun and Richland Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Lexington, Calhoun and Richland Counties. Pee Dee River At Cheraw affecting Chesterfield and Marlboro Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pee Dee River at Cheraw. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, River bottomland downstream from cheraw will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 31.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 13.2 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. this evening at 945 PM EST.
